celestial_enchantments.tooltip.alt: Press [%s] to show enchantment effect formula
celestial_enchantments.tooltip.head: [Helmet]
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.accel: Right click on the crop to consume some durability to ripen the crop
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.arrow: After hitting the target, drag all entities within a radius of [enchantment level]+1 grid with the target as the center to the target
Arrow damage reduced by [Enchantment Level] * 5%, dealing original damage [Enchantment Level] * 10% projectile damage to enemies around the target upon hit
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.born_: Durability will slowly recover in areas with brightness less than 5
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.burst: After hitting the target, there is a [Enchantment Level] * 20% chance of an explosion, which does not damage the blocks

enchantment.celestial_enchantments.corru: +%s Exp pickup, but there has %s chance to gain harmful effects
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.death: Increase damage by %s of the target's maximum health
Deals [Enchantment Level] * 15 magic damage to surrounding creatures upon death
When nearby players with [%s] die, gives %s chance to gain %s, %s, %s, and %s. Otherwise, you will die together
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.destr: Deals %s damage to surrounding targets after being attacked
Increase explosion damage received by %s, and increase other incoming damage by %s

enchantment.celestial_enchantments.divin: The further away from the attacking target, the higher the damage
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.echo_: When receiving a fatal attack, dodge the damage and restore [Enchantment Level] * 5% of maximum health. This effect cools down for 600 seconds
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.explo: The thrown trident has a [Enchantment Level] * 20% chance to explode

enchantment.celestial_enchantments.fierc: Melee damage against the same target is increased by %s
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.firep: Immune to hot floor damage and reduce fire damage taken by %s
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.frost: Deals %s damage to the attacker when attacked, and inflicts %s
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.gift_: When struck by lightning, immediately recover all lost life, then gain %s, %s, and %s
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.have_: After waking up from bed, obtain %s and %s
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.heart: When attacked, burn attacker for %s seconds
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.holy_: When you are attacked while sneaking, gain %s
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.light: Increase %s damage to targets with armor below %s
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.magic: When you hurt an target, deal additional magic damage equal to %s of the original damage
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.misfo: If the target has %s, increase damage by %s

enchantment.celestial_enchantments.origi: There is a probability of obtaining resistance improvement or speed improvement effects when receiving treatment
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.parti: Upon death, surrounding players restore [Enchantment Level] * 8 health points
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.photo: Increase [Enchantment Level] * 12% mining speed in areas with brightness above 10
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.potio: The duration of the obtained potion effect has been increased by [Enchantment Level] * 15%
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.pure_: Continuously clearing the potion effect on the body
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.quenc: When attacking a burning target, extinguish the target's flame and increase damage by %s for every remaining seconds of fire, up to %s
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.quick: While sprinting, increase damage by %s and knock back the target
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.react: After blocking an attack, knock back attack with [Enchantment Level] * 0.5 strength
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.reven: Damage to targets that recently attacked the user is increased by %s
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.scorc: Using a shield to block an attack will cause the attacker to fall into [Enchantment Level] and burn for seconds

enchantment.celestial_enchantments.sharp: Increase [Enchantment Level] * 20% melee and throw damage
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.solid: When the wearer's health is less than half, the damage received is reduced by %s
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.the_h: When killing a target, the probability of the target dropping the equipment they are wearing increases to 100%
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.the_s: When attacked, has %s chance to make surrounding mobs attack the attacker
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.traum: On hurt, restore %s of the damage you took
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.vampi: On attack, heals %s of the damage dealt
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.void_: When you hurt an target, deal %s of the damage as abyss damage to surrounding monsters
